channel.title: Chai D Kanchan on Chai Kanchan
channel.description: Recent content in Chai D Kanchan on Chai Kanchan

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This is a customary ‘Hello world!’ post to check out whether everything’s working on this site, which is not only my personal page but also a work-in-progress learning project for web dev. This initial release is made with the Hugo static site generator, as a straightforward static site serves my needs (articles and a portfolio) well. I’m developing the theme in concert with the site as part of webdev learning, and as such it’s a pretty simple patchwork at the moment.

item.title: SAAoSX
item.description: Quickly view and search the letters in the State Archives of Assyria database, even offline Tabbed panes for choosing between cuneified, transliterated, synthesized normalisations or translations of texts. Integrated glossary with lookup of headwords in context Map the locations of places mentioned in a letter Basic support for reading RINAP volumes On macOS 10.

item.title: SAAo-SX Lite Privacy Policy
item.description: SAAo-SX does not collect, store, or transmit any user data whatsoever. As a content viewer, it offers no facility for the user to enter and record any personally identifiable information. If you’ve chosen to download the Mac App Store distribution of this app, then Apple will hold information on you as part of your transaction with them. For more information, see the Apple Privacy Policy.
